Package model

Class WordleGame

java.lang.Object
model.WordleGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class WordleGame extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the actual game of wordle. It has all the logic behind it.

  • Method Details

    • getRandomWord

      public String getRandomWord()
      This method returns a random word that is used for the target word.
      Returns:
      A String that is picked randomly using the Wordle word database.

    • getTargetWord

      public String getTargetWord()
      This is a getter method that returns the target word.
      Returns:
      A String which is the target word.

    • processGuess

      public boolean processGuess(String guess)
      This method processes each guess. It increases the guess amount, adds the guess to the guess list, and check if the users guess was correct.
      Parameters:
      guess - A String that is the users guess.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean that is true if the guess is correct.

    • getWin

      public boolean getWin()
      This method returns a boolean that shows whether the user won or not.
      Returns:
      A boolean that is true if the user wins.

    • getGuessedLetters

      public ArrayList<Character> getGuessedLetters()
      This method returns the GuessedLetters list.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of characters which is the guessed letters.

    • getGuesses

      public ArrayList<String> getGuesses()
      This method returns the guesses that the user had.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of strings that are the guesses that the use has had.

    • printGuesses

      public void printGuesses()
      This method is used for testing that prints each of the guesses.

    • getGuessAmount

      public int getGuessAmount()
      This method returns the amount of guesses.
      Returns:
      An Integer that is the amount of guesses the user has had

    • getWordList

      public ArrayList<String> getWordList()
      This method returns the list of words that are in the Wordle database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of strings.
